Title: Requires healthcare workers practicing in close proximity to children less than twelve months of age to be vaccinated against pertussis
Summary: Requires healthcare workers who are reasonably expected to practice in close proximity to children less than twelve months of age to be vaccinated against pertussis.
LawCode: Add ยง2166, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring healthcare workers practicing in close proximity to children less than twelve months of age to be vaccinated against pertussis
